head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RAGAN, JOSEPHINE P.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RAGAN, JOSEPHINE P.

block.p: RAGAN-Josephine P. Of Bronxville, NY, on June 3, 2000. Wife of the late Charles A. Ragan Jr. Mother of Ellen Zaldo, Jody McCann, Charles R. Ragan and Maizie Jaffee, sister of Mary, grandmother of 12, great-grandmother of six. Calling hours at the Fred. H. McGrath & Son Funeral Home, Bronxville, between the hours of 69 PM, Monday. Mass of Christian Burial St. Joseph's Church, Bronxville on Tuesday, June 6, at 11 AM. Memorial contributions may be made to the Lighthouse Inc. or St. Jude Childrens Research Hospital.
